summary: Griff wants to maintain just a superficial relationship with his all-gay boyfriend, who gets seriously wounded in a gay bashing.
cast: Daniel Chilson|Niklaus Lange|Don Handfield|Linna Carter|Seabass Diamond|Lesley Pedersen|Ryan Tucker|Nicki Aycox|Laura Fox|Kevin Patrick Wright|Matt Steveley|David Tuchman|Nick Spano|Jess Martell|Katrina Holden Bronson|Jeffrey Hiner|Michael Angelo|Marie Charles|Tammy Lynch|Erika Cohen|Bob Peterson|Nita Genoveva|Allyson Golob|Brendan McIvor Fleming|Brian Farber|Alan Olifson|Kenneth Colom|Peter Sanders|John Deleski|Hugh Benjamin|Eric Scott|Chris Lehmann|Larry Sullivan|Mark Jodoin|Bradley David|Dan Butcher|Greg Money|Danny Roth|Chuck Snay|Erik Jirak|Cameron Trousdale|Steven Burrill|Brian Krinsky|Renee Kelly|Scott Roth|Kevin Spirtas|Christopher Leman|Sandra Varaques
title: Desafiando la gravedad
